English:
This serious game was developed in the academic year 2022/23 by students Mario Petar Bišćan, Luka Friščić and Renato Majer at the Faculty of Electrical Engineering and Computing. 


The project was mentored by professor Jurica Babić and teaching assistant Ivana Slošić.
Hrvatski:
Ovu ozbiljnu igru su u akademskoj godini 2022./23. razvili studenti Mario Petar Bišćan, Luka Friščić i Renato Majer na Fakultetu elektrotehnike i računarstva.


Projekt su vodili profesor Jurica Babić i asistentica Ivana Slošić.
